bug.short_desc: inconsistencies in size of a few Qt window components (in LyX)
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Several components, like menu bar, tab title, some dropdown menus in LyX have a too small size to accommodate their contents, as per http://wiki.lyx.org/uploads/Playground/LyX_screenshot_HiDPI_13inch_display_3200x1800_Fedora24_2016-06-02.png Their size doesn't change with font size scaling (tweak tool, font scaling factor).
QSpinBox +/- buttons should probably be made square (i.e. wider), for better consistency with regular adwaita widgets too.
Menu bar comparison between Lyx, qalculate and shotwell: http://wiki.lyx.org/uploads/Playground/LyX_screenshot_HiDPI_13inch_display_3200x1800_Fedora24_2016-06-02.png
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): LyX v. 2.2.0 that comes with Fedora 24 beta (compiled with Qt 5.6.0)
